mapper.update: update quan_accounts set exchange_id = #{exchangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, exchange_accounts_id = #{exchangeAccountsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, user_id, exchange_accounts_id, state, type from quan_accounts
